Name: Stetmann's Laboratory
Description: A lad always profess himself to be a genius scientist. Probably only Stetmann would do that. Nevertheless, after breathed Terrazine, he is still addicted to various fields of scientific research. You can upgrades your equipment through Stetmann's Laboratory.

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Cancels construction of this structure, destroying the structure and giving a partial refund.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Root.Name: Halt

Root.Tooltip: Selects the unit constructing this structure.
Root.Name: Select Builder

Root.Tooltip:
Enhance the ability of side weapon Shooting Assistant.
1. Increase Shooting Assistant damage by 3.
2. Summon one more Shooting Assistant.
Root.Name: Research Shooting Assistant Practical BluePrint

Root.Tooltip:
Further enhance the ability of side weapon Shooting Assistant.
1. Increase Shooting Assistant damage by 3.
2. Summon one more Shooting Assistant.
3. Maximum charge of Shooting Assistant increases by 1.
Root.Name: Research Shooting Assistant Elite BluePrint

Root.Tooltip:
Enhance the ability of main weapon Micro Shock Cannon.
1. Micro Shock Cannon weapon damage increases by 40, additional damage vs. Structure increases by 40.
2. Attack speed of Micro Shock Cannon increases by 0.2, split damage range increases by 0.6.
3. High-energy Shooting's lasting time increases by 5, damage increases by 20, and maximum charge increases by 1.
4. Now Micro Shock Cannon can stun enemy units for 0.75 second.
Root.Name: Research Micro Shock Cannon Practical BluePrint

Root.Tooltip:
Further enhance the ability of main weapon Micro Shock Cannon.
1. Micro Shock Cannon weapon damage increases by 40, additional damage vs. Structure increases by 40.
2. Attack speed of Micro Shock Cannon increases by 0.2, split damage range increases by 0.6.
3. High-energy Shooting's lasting time increases by 5 seconds, damage increases by 20, and maximum charge increases by 1.
4. The stuning time of Micro Shock Cannon increases by 0.5 second.
5. Now Micro Shock Cannon can deal single-target damage to air unit.
Root.Name: Research Micro Shock Cannon Elite BluePrint

Root.Tooltip:
Enhance the ability of side weapon The Bro's Grenade.
1. The Bro's Grenade deals 25 more damage.
2. Maximum charge of Grenade increases by 1.
3. Now The Bro's Grenade will drag all nearby units to the centre of the explosion, lasting for 2 seconds.
Root.Name: Research The Bro's Grenade Practical BluePrint

Root.Tooltip:
Further enhance Increase the ability of side weapon The Bro's Grenade.
1. The Bro's Grenade deals 25 more damage.
2. Maximum charge of Grenade increases by 1.
3. Now The Bro's Grenade will bounce forward for 3 blocks, explode one more time, and deal 50 damage.
Root.Name: Research The Bro's Grenade Elite BluePrint

Root.Tooltip:
Enhance the ability of main weapon C-16.
1. C-16 weapon damage increases by 30.
2. C-16 weapon range increases by 1/
3. No.12 Strike Bullet's damage increases by 75.
Root.Name: Research C-16 "Cowboy" Riffle Practical BluePrint

Root.Tooltip:
Further enhance the ability of main weapon C-16.
1. C-16 weapon damage increases by 30.
2. C-16 weapon range increases by 1/
3. No.12 Strike Bullet's damage increases by 75.
Root.Name: Research C-16 "Cowboy" Riffle Elite BluePrint

Root.Tooltip:
Enhance the ability of main weapon The Landing Point.
1. The weapon damage of The Landing Point increases by 5 and attack speed increases by 0.025.
2. The health of Mini Bunker increases by 275, machine gun turret damage increases by 10, and armor increases by 2.
3. Additional attack range provided by Advanced Aiming System increases by 1, and additional attack speed increases by 200%.
4. Life regeneration rate provided by Repair Drone increases by 7.
5. Now The Landing Point can reduce the armor of target unit to 0, lasting for 60 seconds.
Root.Name: Research The Landing Point Practical BluePrint

Root.Tooltip:
Further enhance the ability of main weapon The Landing Point.
1. The weapon damage of The Location Site increases by 5 and attack speed increases by 0.025.
2. The health of Mini Bunker increases by 275, machine gun turret damage increases by 10, and armor increases by 2.
3. Additional attack range provided by Advanced Aiming System increases by 1, and additional attack speed increases by 200%.
4. Life regeneration rate provided by Repair Drone increases by 8.
5. Now the target killed by The Landing Point will terrify nearby enemy units, lasting for 4 seconds.
Root.Name: Research The Landing Point Elite BluePrint

Root.Tooltip:
Enhance the ability of the supportive equipment The Wine of Immortality.
1. Increase the health regeneration rate by 3.
2. Additional attack Speed provided by The Wine of Immortality increases by 10%.
3. Wine of Immortality will heal 150 more.
4. The lasting time of The Wine of Immortality increases by 5.
5. The maximum charge of The Wine of Immortality increases by 1.
Root.Name: Research The Wine of Immortality Practical Upgrade BluePrint

Root.Tooltip:
Enhance the ability of the supportive equipment The Wine of Immortality.
1. Increase the health regeneration rate by 3.
2. Additional attack Speed provided by The Wine of Immortality increases by 10%.
3. Wine of Immortality will heal 150 more.
4. The lasting time of The Wine of Immortality increases by 5.
5. The maximum charge of The Wine of Immortality increases by 1.
Root.Name: Research The Wine of Immortality Elite Upgrade BluePrint

Root.Tooltip:
Enhance the ability of supportive equipment The Space Fragmentation.
1.Cooldown of "The World!!!" reduces by 3 seconds.
2. The speed reduction effect by Space Fragmentation increase by 10%.
3. The damege per second of Space Fragmentation increase by 5.
4. Space Fragmentation maximum charge increase by 1.
Root.Name: Research The Space Fragmentation Practical Upgrade BluePrint

Root.Tooltip:
Further enhance the ability of supportive equipment The Space Fragmentation.
1.Cooldown of "The World!!!" reduces by 3 seconds.
2. The speed reduction effect by Space Fragmentation increase by 10%.
3. The damege per second of Space Fragmentation increase by 5.
4. Space Fragmentation maximum charge increase by 1.
Root.Name: Research The Space Fragmentation Elite Upgrade BluePrint

Root.Tooltip:
Enhance the ability of side weapon The Bulldog.
1. P.O.W.E.R's critical hit damage increases by 100%.
2. "You are a Mortal!" have one more bullet.
3. The explosive damage dealed by "You are a Mortal!" increases by 100.
4. "You are a Mortal!" deal 250 more damage to the key target.
Root.Name: Research The Bulldog Practical Upgrade BluePrint

Root.Tooltip:
Further enhance the ability of side weapon The Bulldog.
1. P.O.W.E.R's critical hit damage increases by 100%.
2. "You are a Mortal!" have one more bullet.
3. The explosive damage dealed by "You are a Mortal!" increases by 100.
4. "You are a Mortal!" deal 250 more damage to the key target.
Root.Name: Research The Bulldog Elite Upgrade BluePrint

Root.Tooltip:
Enhance the ability of supportive equipment The Over-Daytime Rome.
1. The structure repairation rate increases by 10 and damage reduction increases by 10%.
2. Caesar Planetary Fortress's health increases by 800, armor increases by 2, and weapon damage increases by 40.
3. The lasting time of Caesar Planetary Fortress increases by 15.
Root.Name: Research The Over-Daytime Rome Practical Upgrade BluePrint

Root.Tooltip:
Enhance the ability of supportive equipment The Over-Daytime Rome.
1. The structure repairation rate increases by 10 and damage reduction increases by 10%.
2. Caesar Planetary Fortress's health increases by 800, armor increases by 2, and weapon damage increases by 40.
3. The lasting time of Caesar Planetary Fortress increases by 15.
Root.Name: Research The Over-Daytime Rome Elite Upgrade BluePrint

Root.Tooltip: The Stetmann's Laboratory can research two projects at the same time.
Root.Name: Advanced Research
